lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 18 points as the host Oklahoma City Thunder beat Minnesota, 88-85, for its first victory since moving from Seattle. Russell Westbrook, who fueled a 13-0 run that pulled the Thunder out of a third-quarter deficit, made the go-ahead basket with 2 minutes 19 seconds left.
